title: HTMLDialogElement: showModal() method
summary:
The showModal() method of the
  HTMLDialogElement interface displays the dialog as a modal, over the top
  of any other dialogs that might be present. It displays in the top layer, along with a
  ::backdrop pseudo-element. Interaction outside the dialog is blocked and
  the content outside it is rendered inert.
pageTitle: HTMLDialogElement: showModal() method - Web APIs | MDN
